pages.text: Protorosaurus was an early lizard like reptile from the late Permian period. It was an archosauromorph with a long neck and it grew up to 2 meters long. It vaguely resembled a monitor lizard and would have hunted smaller tetrapods.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Eggs in Nest
